description: what is the way to login for app ?
I'm a big fan of wallabag, and with this app I can read the articles with no distractions. Looking forward to enjoy it on the Librem or Pinephone.

First, you'll need an account in a Wallabag instance, such as Framabag.

Then, you need to go to the settings menu of your Wallabag/Framabag account ('Configuration'), then add a new API client ('Gestion des clients API', then 'Creer un nouveau client'). This will give you a client ID and secret key.

Finally, you can login using your instance URL (e.g. https://framabag.org), username, password, client ID, AND your client secret.

Once that's all done, you get a nice Wallabag reader that is mobile-friendly (works on PinePhone).
summary: A bit of effort to set up, but worth it

description: WIth a selfhosted instance of Wallabag on Ubuntu 21.10, it crashes after entering login data, than crashes on every next start.
Associé à une instance Wallabag, il permet de lire les articles mis de côté. Il fonctionne très simplement.
summary: Un très bon lecteur pour Wallabag
